activities:
Users may provide us personal information upon registering their products, licensing our software, registering for and using our websites. We use personal information that we receive from EU users primarily to: (1) provide support activities, such as fulfilling product orders and ensuring customers have access to our channel partners and providing technical support and improve product offerings; (2) identify potential customers and conduct prospective sales and marketing activities, including conducting market research, displaying personalized web content and making contact with prospective customers to discuss Control4 products and offers; (3) implement and provide Control4's home automation services and applications and (4) implement internal business processes such as contracting, account processing and management, and compliance with governmental, legislative and regulatory bodies. 

We also may receive human resources data from our subsidiaries within the EU, which is used internally to administer benefits, pay salaries and other internal administrative functions.
